list_definition.definition: (an) act of referring (to something); a mention (of something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He made several references to her latest book
With reference to your request for information, I regret to inform you that I am unable to help you.

list_definition.definition: a note about one’s character, ability etc, eg when one applies for a new job

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Our new secretary had excellent references from her previous employers.

list_definition.definition: an indication in a book, report etc, showing where one got one’s information or where further information can be found

list_ex_of_english: Of these, only 1% of past temporal reference contexts were marked by periphrastic did.
If a value has a unique type, then there can be only one reference to it.

Once such a set is deter1 mined on a reference plane, the surfaces are essentially fixed for the entire flow field.

The period of reference is the past 1 month and detailed questions were asked about the past 1 week.
